mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FIND_BOARD(WRITE_NO, NICKNAME, TITLE, CONTENT, AGE, REGION, GENDER, ID) VALUES(FIND_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{nickName}, #{title}, #{content}, #{age}, #{region}, #{gen},#{id})
mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM FIND_BOARD ORDER BY WRITE_NO DESC) A) B WHERE RN BETWEEN #{s} and #{e}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM FIND_BOARD ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
mapper.update: UPDATE FIND_BOARD SET VIEWS=VIEWS+1 WHERE WRITE_NO=#{writeNo}
UPDATE FIND_BOARD SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, AGE=#{age}, REGION=#{region}, GENDER=#{gen} WHERE WRITE_NO=#{writeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FIND_RE(RE_NICK, RE_COMENT, WRITE_GROUP, RE_ID) VALUES(#{reNick}, #{reComent}, #{writeGroup}, #{reId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FIND_RE WHERE WRITE_GROUP = #{writeNo} ORDER BY RE_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FIND_BOARD WHERE REGION LIKE '%'||#{optRegion}||'%' AND GENDER LIKE '%'||#{optGender}||'%' AND AGE BETWEEN #{btwA} AND #{btwB}

SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM FIND_BOARD WHERE REGION LIKE '%'||#{optRegion}||'%' AND GENDER LIKE '%'||#{optGender}||'%' AND AGE BETWEEN #{btwA} AND #{btwB} ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC) A) B WHERE RN BETWEEN #{s} AND #{e}
